IllinoisIntro: ^Hmm... let's see, I don't remember mapping a pool of water...
^I thought you might be some mythomorph that creeped up on me.
^According to my notes, there shouldn't being an entrance to the cave around here, though.
^How'd you manage your your way in here, kid?

s: ^There was a large hole in the ground so naturally I jumped in.

g-6: ^Ahh, a cave-in. That would explain all this uncharted water!
^The ground collapsing must have uncovered an underground stream.
^That'll surely make getting out of here more troublesome than it already was...
^Oh sorry, I guess I should introduce myself.
^Explorer, researcher, mythtorian and professional super model. And you are?

s: ^My name is Marco, and I'm going to become the strongest myth master!

Model: ^Most people are caught off guard when I ask that,
^Which is why I always come prepared.
^Here's my photo on page 8 of the annual mythtorian calendar.

g-3: ^Well, you're the one who asked, anyways, what's your name?

s: ^My name is Marco, and I'm going to become the strongest myth master.

MythMaster: ^You would get along swimmingly with my intern.
^Welp, that's a nice goal and all but so long as were stuck down here...
^the only thing I see us becoming is a plaything for a wild morph.

s: ^Well, how did you get in here in the first place?

g-4: ^I came through an entrance connected to some ruins I've been investigating.
^Unfortunately, I was chased out by a swarm of mythomorphs.
^Must have been caused by your little cave-in.
^Even worse, it seems I lost my mythogem during my escape...
^Hold on a second, I see you have a mythogem wrapped around your neck!
^You wouldn't happen to have any mythomorphs at your disposal now would you?

s: ^Well, it would be a bit hard to be a myth master and all without one.

g-11: ^Alright. If I'm able to get us to where I dropped my mythogem...
^I can use my morphs to guide us to the ruins entrance.
^But to do that, we would have to fend off any wild morphs that try to stop us on the way there.
^I feel bad asking this, but since it's our only choice;
^Marco, would you be able to clear the way for us to get there?

s: ^Sure, sounds like good practice. Just stay behind me, old man, I'll keep you safe.

g-18: ^Maybe being stuck here all alone wasn't such a bad thing.

FirstEncounter: ^Well, looks like our luck has already ran short.
^That's a sharpuch, a nasty little critter that will hunt you down relentlessly in the hopes of stealing any shinies you may have on you.
^It looks like we'll have to fight him in order to get past. Alright, go on and show him what you got, kid!
Tutorial: ^... You mean to tell me you've NEVER fought a mythomorph before?

g-1: ^But you said you were going to be the strongest Myth Master?!!
g-2: ^Alright, fine. I may not be an expert, but I can give you a few pointers to start out.
^In mythomorph battles, you got two types of basic attacks: LIGHT Attacks and HEAVY attacks.
^LIGHT attacks are moves that can be thrown out at a moments notice, with little delay in between each one.
^These can be used by pressing right click.
^HEAVY attacks are moves that take a little longer to charge up and require a small break in between each.
^In return, they dish out much more damage than a LIGHT attack.
^These can be used by pressing left click
g-11: ^Alright, why not try your skills out on Sharpuch, then, see what you got?

Fight_Done: ^I was a bit worried there but nicely done!

g-2: ^Well let's hope it stays that way. Come on! Let's keep going.

Key: ^Hmm.. this door wasn't closed when I went through it.

s: ^Well, why don't we just open it?

g-1: ^We need a key to open the door, but it seems to have gone missing, probably snatched by
^Look around the area and see if you can find the key. Stay on your toes though, we don't know what's hiding in the dark.
g-3: ^Kid, you're making this a lot more stressful than it already is.

Key_Obtained: ^Great job! Get inside and let's get to the ruin.
Ruin_Entrance: ^Alright, we're almost to where I was when I lost my mythogem. It should be just a bit further down. Let's hurry before we run into any serious trouble.
Boss_Encounter: ^Well, you wanted a challenge kid, you got one. Good luck.
Temple_End_Arrival: ^Phew, looks like we arrived in one piece. I had my doubts but I gotta hand it to you, kid, you really did pull through. Give me a second to look around for my mythogem and we'll be on our way.
Exit: ^Follow me! We're getting out of here!
